title: Philbert
description: Detective John Philbert is a man from another time. But now he finds himself in a new time, in a time he doesn’t understand. His partner isn’t a ghost… or is he?
quote: Hey partner, looks like you’re getting soft… serve frozen yogurt.
creator: Flip McVicker
studio: What Time Is It Right Now?
altHero: BoJack Horseman is Philbert, holding a cigarette and talking to Sassy Malone at a party
alt1: Philbert has been shot by a lizard woman in a dress
alt2: a nude Philbert changes a lightbulb
alt3: Philbert and Fritz are surrounded by men with guns
alt4: Philbert and Sassy look out the window as a bomb falls from the sky
